actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to extend in the case of certain decedents the period during which no recapture tax is imposed under the special estate tax evaluation provisions for certain farm, etc., real property.

summary.text: Extends until August 13, 1984, the period in which an heir must use certain farm and business property eligible for special use valuation tax treatment in order to avoid the recapture of estate tax.

titles.title: A bill to extend in the case of certain decedents the period during which no recapture tax is imposed under the special estate tax evaluation provisions for certain farm, etc., real property.
